model.json

Class Sender

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.json.Sender

  • public class Sender
extends java.lang.Object
    Bean containing the information about a data sender (motes acting as sender). Created by Mathieu on 23/01/2015.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int id
      ID of the sender.
      private java.lang.String ipv6
      IP address version 6 of the sender.
      private double lat
      Latitude of the geographical position of the sender.
      private double lon
      Longitude of the geographical position of the sender.
      private java.lang.String mac
      MAC address of the sender.
